meanings.definition: A small insect that feeds on plant sap.
meanings.sent1: The jassids were tiny bugs on the leaves.
meanings.sent2: Farmers need to protect their crops from jassids.
meanings.sent3: The jassids had a party on the tomato plant.
meanings.sent4: The jassids were like tiny vampires sucking the life out of the plants.
meanings.sent5: The jassids danced on the green leaves, sipping the plant's juice.

meanings.sent1: Look at all the jassids flying around the garden.
meanings.sent2: The field was full of jassids buzzing in the air.
meanings.sent3: The jassids gathered for a meeting on the rose bush.
meanings.sent4: The jassids swarmed like a cloud of tiny insects.
meanings.sent5: The jassids covered the plants like a living blanket.
